3.description: Focus background; Background for selected rows in tables or other elements.

10.description: Background color for an information box;

400.description: Hover/focus state for primary colored elements; Do not use as background color

600.description: Active state for primary colored elements

400.description: Hover/focus state for secondary colored elements

500.description: Default buttons; Base for neutral colors

650.description: Active state for secondary colored elements

400.description: Hover/focus state for accent colored elements; Do not use as background color

500.description: Highlighting and special buttons eg. transactions; Do not use as background color

600.description: Active state for accent colored elements; Do not use as background color

0.description: Default background color for large areas; Body text, button, link and icons on dark or brand backgrounds

1.description: Light background color for large areas

20.description: Light background color for large areas

200.description: Disabled background color; Disabled or lighter border color; Do not use as background color

300.description: Disabled text without background color; Do not use as background color

400.description: Border, icons, disabled text; Hover/focus state for secondary colored elements; Do not use as background color

500.description: Text hints, icons, form label, read-only; darker border color; Default buttons;

650.description: Headlines; Active state for secondary colored elements; Dark (footer) background

800.description: Text, buttons and icons; Off-Canvas navigation background;  Darker (footer) background

20.description: Background color for an error notification

500.description: Inline error text and icon color for a notification that indicates a wrong action or error message; Do not use as background color

100.description: Background color for a warning notification

500.description: Icon color for a notification that indicates something is wrong; Do not use as background color

5.description: Background color for a success information in a table or other elements

10.description: Background color for a success notification

500.description: Icon color for a notification that indicates when a user successfully completes a task; Do not use as background color
